about_the_game:
Add a shiny gold sticker to your title screen reading "Registered Shareware!"

That's it. That's all this DLC does. It adds no further functionality than a shiny gold sticker.

Because The Shadow Over Cyberspace is a fully-released, fully-free game with no free-to-play elements and no microtransactions, the "Shareware" donation is a way of saying thank you to the developers and compensating them for their hard work.

It's entirely optional. Appreciated, but optional. Have fun facing digital cosmic horrors, either way!

That's it. That's all this DLC does. It adds no further functionality than a shiny gold sticker.

Because The Shadow Over Cyberspace is a fully-released, fully-free game with no free-to-play elements and no microtransactions, the "Shareware" donation is a way of saying thank you to the developers and compensating them for their hard work.

It's entirely optional. Appreciated, but optional. Have fun facing digital cosmic horrors, either way!
